name: text1
text: I pulled the carpet with all my strength and the mayor fell. Rolled into a carpet, he was no longer so aggressive.

name: text2
text: In our village they say: 'Where there is a liar and a grabber, do not expect a good luck.' This is the way to find reliable people.

name: text3
text: There is a lot to be done, but I think I have found a recipe for how to live honestly and achieve more - work hard, do not betray and follow the dream.
